    • getNamespace

      public String getNamespace()
      Description copied from class: Grammar
      What is this grammar's namespace ? This will help separate grammar rules with matching names from different grammars, which is of importance when composing grammars.
      Overrides:
      getNamespace in class CobolPreprocessingBaseGrammar

    • commentEntry

      public ParserCombinator commentEntry()
      This is a deprecated language feature, but one which appears quite prominently in the testsuite.

      The implementation is based on a description found here: Micro Focus COBOL - 5.1 Identification Division.
